---
title: "TextLogLevel"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

The severity level of a text log message.

Recommended to be one of:
* `"CRITICAL"`
* `"ERROR"`
* `"WARN"`
* `"INFO"`
* `"DEBUG"`
* `"TRACE"`

## Rerun datatype
[`Utf8`](../datatypes/utf8.md)


## Arrow datatype
```
utf8
```
